TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mancu_a_kamu, title = Mancu_a_kamu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mancu_a_kamu} }

S.FORM: tada kamu nu Mancu u Mancu a kamu／manyi , nu Ae-tayyi-si nantun kuse-yicu. yu cincaw zitay naw layak ku kamu, singanganaca tu " cinyi". Tatengaay nu nakamuan nu manyi pangangan hantu " kuyhun-yi", tapang nu nakamuan u caaya henay picumu a cincuo a ngalnganlan, Cenlun mihcaan namaka cinkawcun a nisiluda, sisa si nganganaca tu " cindin-sin-cenyi". ". Cencaw a zitayan, makaadih ku Mancu-zen tu Hunti' pabeli tu lili, cuose, sapatubeli nu cancanan a kawawan nu sasiludan. anu cuose-ce idaw kuniladayan nida tu caaya kalucek nu nakamuan a kaynah nu Hunti. kunlin-kung atu tangce misalisin satu u sapabeli tu tuas a nakamuan awkamutu nu nisiludan tu kamu nu samanyi. tinisatu, mamcuzen nu caaya kalecad a aaenengan caay namim kalecad ku nakamuan, mahida u pai-cen "p", sencen "q", nengkuta, alacuke' nu nakamuan. .

tada kamo no Manco o Manco a kamo／manyi , no Ae-tayyi-si nanton kose-yico. yo cincaw zitay naw layak ko kamo, singanganaca to " cinyi". Tatengaay no nakamoan no manyi pangangan hanto " koyhon-yi", tapang no nakamoan o caaya henay picomo a cincoo a ngalnganlan, Cenlon mihcaan namaka cinkawcon a nisiloda, sisa si nganganaca to " cindin-sin-cenyi". ". Cencaw a zitayan, makaadih ko Manco-zen to Honti' pabeli to lili, coose, sapatobeli no cancanan a kawawan no sasilodan. ano coose-ce idaw koniladayan nida to caaya kalocek no nakamoan a kaynah no Honti. konlin-kong ato tangce misalisin sato o sapabeli to toas a nakamoan awkamoto no nisilodan to kamo no samanyi. tinisato, mamcozen no caaya kalecad a aaenengan caay namim kalecad ko nakamoan, mahida o pai-cen "p", sencen "q", nengkota, alacoke' no nakamoan. .
